mapper.sql: ID, COMP_ID, STREET_TERRITORY_ID, STREET_PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, CITY_NAME, CODE, SEQ_NO, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DEL, DEL_USER_ID, DEL_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from FUN_STREET_CITY
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into FUN_STREET_CITY (COMP_ID, STREET_TERRITORY_ID, STREET_PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, CITY_NAME, CODE, SEQ_NO, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DEL, DEL_USER_ID, DEL_TIME) values (#{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{streetProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STREET_TERRITORY_ID = #{streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STREET_PROVINCE_ID = #{streetProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CITY_NAME = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEL_TIME = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update FUN_STREET_CITY set COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_TERRITORY_ID = #{streetTerritoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STREET_PROVINCE_ID = #{streetProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_NAME = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ_NO = #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_TIME = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.COMP_ID, A.STREET_TERRITORY_ID, A.STREET_PROVINCE_ID, A.CITY_ID, A.CITY_NAME, A.CODE, A.SEQ_NO, A.REMARK, A.CREATE_TIME, B.PROVINCE_NAME, C.TERRITORY_NAME FROM FUN_STREET_CITY A LEFT JOIN FUN_STREET_PROVINCE B ON A.STREET_PROVINCE_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN FUN_TERRITORY C ON A.STREET_TERRITORY_ID = C.ID WHERE A.STREET_PROVINCE_ID = #{streetProvinceId} AND A.IS_DEL = 0 ORDER BY A.SEQ_NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE FUN_STREET_CITY SET IS_DEL = 1, DEL_TIME = GETDATE(), DEL_USER_ID = #{delUserId} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.COMP_ID, A.STREET_TERRITORY_ID, A.STREET_PROVINCE_ID, A.CITY_ID, A.CITY_NAME, A.CODE, A.SEQ_NO, A.REMARK, A.CREATE_TIME, B.PROVINCE_NAME, C.TERRITORY_NAME FROM FUN_STREET_CITY A LEFT JOIN FUN_STREET_PROVINCE B ON A.STREET_PROVINCE_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN FUN_TERRITORY C ON A.STREET_TERRITORY_ID = C.ID WHERE A.ID = #{streetCityId}
